name: This Game is For You: Fun Center
name_original: This Game is For You: Fun Center
description:
Plot:

In an alternate reality where This Game is For You becomes one of the most popular video games of all time, the developer has decided to grow it into a franchise and has even created 31 Fun Center locations all around the world. You are a security guard at one of these Fun Centers. Will you survive your week?

Gameplay:

-Keep the characters at bay and survive the night.

-There are some lore notes scattered around the Fun Center that will randomly spawn each night - the player can pick them up and read them.

-There are two keys for the Kitchen and Manager's Office that will spawn in random locations each night. The Kitchen isn't enterable, but opening the door will play a random event. The Manager's Office key opens the Manager's office and the player can find a nightly collectable in there.

-The game has a save system which saves your current night and the collectables you have found. You must always remember to save before exiting.

-By finding all 7 collectables, the player will unlock the secret night.

If you have any issues, be sure to let me know!
